context: Enterprise software company requiring cloud infrastructure migration, evaluating three major cloud providers for $2.5M annual contract

request.purpose: Cloud infrastructure migration and managed services for 3-year term
request.justification: Critical for scaling operations and reducing on-premise infrastructure costs

decision_process.outcome: Clear RFP issued to 3 qualified vendors
Shortlisted to 2 final vendors with detailed scoring
Selected Vendor A with optimized 3-year agreement

business_impact.expected_outcome: 40% reduction in infrastructure costs, 60% improvement in deployment speed, enhanced scalability for growth
business_impact.projected_value: $8M in cost savings and productivity gains over 3 years

outcome_tracking.6_month_review: Migration 70% complete, cost savings of $800K realized, performance metrics meeting targets
outcome_tracking.12_month_review: Migration complete, total savings $2.1M, deployment speed improved 55%, user satisfaction high
outcome_tracking.actual_roi: 78% of projected 3-year value achieved in first 12 months

lessons_learned: Comprehensive RFP process improved vendor selection quality, phased migration approach minimized business disruption, early security involvement prevented compliance issues
